name: compose-craft
tagline: A visual editor for creating and managing Docker Compose files
description: ComposeCraft is a web-based GUI for generating and managing Docker Compose files. It lets users visually edit services, volumes, and networks and export YAML, ideal for beginners and system administrators.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Build Docker Compose files with drag-and-drop interface. No YAML expertise needed

features.title: Service Management
features.description: Configure containers, volumes, and networks visually. Intuitive configuration

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Generate clean, production-ready compose files. Copy and deploy instantly

features.title: Media Library
features.description: No installation required, works in any browser. Start composing immediately

features.title: Template Library
features.description: Pre-built configurations for common services. Deploy popular apps quickly
